trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property of a column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged>evento é desencadeado quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>propriedade de uma coluna num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar as alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The column with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property that changed.
The previous <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> value of the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property.
Gets the column with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coluna com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>propriedade foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property that changed.
Gets the previous value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property of the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor anterior a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>propriedade da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> value representing the previous value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs.Column*>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> representando o valor anterior a <> </> *> propriedade o <> </> *>.
